description: BonkBot is a crypto trading platform that includes a high-speed Telegram bot and a browser-based terminal called Telemetry. The platform has processed over $10B in trading volume and served more than 450K users.
keyRoles: Built the frontend of Telemetry using React with real-time TradingView integration
Handled websocket-driven live and historical data for low-latency trading performance
Developed backend features for the Telegram bot using Node.js and Telegraf.js
Implemented swap flows, trade commands, and session management with PostgreSQL and Redis
Deployed and monitored production systems using Google Cloud and Grafana
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to iterate quickly and maintain platform reliability

description: Cega was a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol enabling users to invest in options, bonds, and structured products across Ethereum Mainnet, Arbitrum, and Solana. Before sunsetting in November 2024, the platform had processed over $500 million in trades.
keyRoles: Developed and maintained the frontend interface of the Cega platform using React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Implemented key features such as buy-selling products, managing portfolios, switching between networks, and connecting different wallets.
Maintained the internal trading platform, ensuring smooth operation and user experience.
Collaborated with the backend team to integrate smart contracts and ensure seamless communication between the frontend and blockchain.
Worked on real-time data visualization for the platform, ensuring that data is displayed accurately and securely for authenticated users.

description: Multiplyr is a web3-based company that is focused on building Affine DeFi, a decentralized finance platform designed to help users grow their money. The platform aims to create a more accessible and transparent financial system by utilizing blockchain technology to enable trustless transactions and avoid the need for intermediaries.
keyRoles: Collaborated with other engineers, designers, and product managers to develop the frontend interface of the Affine DeFi platform using Next.js, ethers.js, and react-bootstrap.
Contributed to defi-sdk, used to communicate between the frontend and blockchain.
Helped develop and maintain authentication functionality for the platform.
Worked on real-time data visualization for the platform, ensuring that data is displayed accurately and securely for authenticated users.
If needed, assisted with backend tasks using FastAPI.
Stayed up-to-date with the latest developments in DeFi and blockchain technology to ensure that the Affine DeFi platform is both secure and user-friendly.
Mentored and provided guidance to other frontend engineers on the team.

description: Saimon Global is a travel-based company that provides various travel-related services such as booking, visa assistance, and air ticketing. Additionally, they have a product for healthcare that offers telemedicine services. They aim to provide innovative and reliable solutions to help their clients enjoy hassle-free travel experiences and access quality healthcare remotely.
keyRoles: Developing and maintaining front-end applications for web and mobile using various technologies, such as Next.js, React.js, and Flutter, while ensuring cross-browser compatibility, responsiveness, and high performance.
Developing and publishing mobile apps for Android and iOS, ensuring that they meet the desired requirements and quality standards.
Implementing key features of the applications, such as search, booking, payment processing, and user account management, and integrating third-party APIs.

Collaborating with a team of developers, designers, and other stakeholders to plan, design, and develop the applications, while participating in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure the quality of the applications.
Creating and maintaining documentation for the various components and features of the applications, including user guides, technical specifications, and code documentation.
Ensuring the security and privacy of user data by implementing appropriate measures such as encryption, authentication, and access controls, and complying with industry standards.
Providing technical support and troubleshooting assistance to users, and resolving any issues or bugs that arise, while ensuring timely and effective communication with customers and stakeholders.
Staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure that the applications remain competitive and innovative.
Conducting thorough testing and debugging to ensure that the applications are stable, secure, and user-friendly.

description: Hungrynaki has experienced significant market growth in recent years, becoming one of the leading food delivery services in Bangladesh. They offer a diverse selection of cuisines from a wide range of restaurants, with an easy-to-use platform that allows customers to place orders and track deliveries. Hungrynaki's focus on customer service and timely delivery has helped to solidify its position in the highly competitive online food delivery market in Bangladesh.
keyRoles: Building reusable and functional components for the new software system
Contributing to front-end and back-end development
Using various technologies such as Nuxt.js, React.js, Vue.js, Hapi.js, GraphQL, SASS, Stylus, and other CSS frameworks
Creating customer support, delivery support, vendor workflow, and admin panel
Implementing real-time data flow using GraphQL Subscription (web socket connection) and other cutting-edge technologies
Working closely with the team to ensure a successful transition from the old system to the new microservice-based system
Maintaining the old system during the transition period

description: Regfire Solutions Ltd. is a professional services firm that specializes in providing cost-effective and efficient solutions to businesses across a variety of industries. Their services include consulting, outsourcing, and staffing solutions, with a focus on finance and accounting, technology, and human resources. The company prides itself on its personalized approach, tailoring their services to meet each client's unique needs and requirements. With a team of experienced professionals and a commitment to delivering results, Regfire Solutions helps businesses achieve their goals and optimize their operations.
keyRoles: Developed backend APIs using Laravel 5.6
Built web applications with React.js, Vue.js, bootstrap, and other CSS frameworks
Contributed to the development of several web applications, including a CRM system for a client
Collaborated with senior developers and designers
Participated in code reviews
Learned important lessons in project management, communication, and teamwork
